mods.abstract: DETAINED in the jail of the parish of St. John the Baptist, the creole negro boy CELESTIN, aged about 22 years, and 5 feet 8 inches high. He says he belongs to Mr. Adelard Landry, of Ascension. The owner is hereby duly notified to claim his property according to law. URSIN JACOB, sheriff. St John the Baptist, May 17th, 1862

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
